features: 【Heat Resistant Mat Size】:12”x14”. Our sliding mats for countertop appliances compatible with COSORI Air Fryer 5.8 Qt, Instant Vortex Plus Air Fryer 6Qt, Instant pot duo Plus Pressure Cooker 6Qt and all the appliances with bottom sizes less than 14" x 12".It can be cut down to fit smaller appliances, so you don’t waste any precious counter space!

【Premium Appliance Sliders for Kitchen Appliances 】: 2 in1 heat resistant mat for countertops is made of combination of durable rubber and cloth, stitched edges to keep their shape and do not fall apart. They are designed to last a long time in your kitchen even with everyday use. You can use them for all of your small appliances, moved with ease across the counter. Machine washable for your convenience!!!

【Heat Resistant Function】: QHANSHIEE heat resistant mat for air fryers uses thermal insulation to protect your countertop from the heat! . Unprotected air fryer will come in direct contact with the marble kitchen countertop, and can be a cause of cracking granite or marble countertop. This air fryer accessories can perfectly solve the heating problem of air fryer.Compared with manual appliance sliding trays, this silicone mats for kitchen counter is more flexible and practical.

【Versatile Countertop Heat Protector Mat 】: Appliance glide mats can help you move your heavy kitchen appliances such as COSORI Ninja Foodi air fryer, coffee maker, kitchen aid mixer, stand mixer, tilt-head mixer blender, food processor, crockpot, coffee pot,Ice machine easily from the storage corner to the edge of your operation. Countertop appliance slider Mats are especially suitable for marble or tile kitchen counters.

【What You Get】: 1 Pack 12"x14" air fryer heat resistant mat for COSORI Air Fryer 5.8 Qt, Ninja Air Fryer 4 Qt ,365 days quality warranty and 24hours friendly customer service. If you are not satisfied with our countertop heat protector mat within one year, feel free to contact us, you will get a new replacement or full refund with no question asked! You can’t go wrong with QHANSHIEE!!!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1 Pack Kitchen Appliances Slider Mat 1 Packs Kitchen Appliances Slider Mat Do you find yourself that kitchen mixers small appliances are usually very heavy, and it usually takes a lot of effort to move them out. Make life in the kitchen a little easier with this simple solution. Just place a mat under your Air fryer, coffee maker, stand mixer or toaster and move them around with ease. This simple and reasonable solution protects countertops, tables, and floors from scratches and scuffs. Our set includes four mats, It can be cut to fit so they become virtually invisible.

Kitchen Appliances Slider Mats Features 14"X12" Sizes Kitchen Appliance Sliders 12”x14”, meet your different requirements. Stitched Edges Shape Coffee Maker Appliance Mats let you easily move countertop appliances with no lifting. Just tug slightly on the mat to slide your appliance. Easy Moving These lightweight mats can help protect your counter from any scratches it may get from sliding appliances back and forth.

Coffee Pot Slider Tray Kitchen appliance mat using in coffee corner,quickly move single cup coffeemakers, drip coffee makers, espresso machines and more. Stand Air Fryer Slider Tray Kitchen appliance mat using in kitchen corner, Effortlessly move heavy appliances like Kitchen Aid Air Fryer. Blender Slider Tray Kitchen small appliance mat using in countertop, easy to move Vitamix blenders, Nutribullet blenders, SodaStream machines, food processors, and spice racks. Cookware Slider Tray Kitchen small appliance mat using in kitchen corner, Cookware Slide toasters, toaster ovens, panini presses, and air fryers with ease!

reviews.reviewText: This was just what I was looking for. I am able to move heavy appliances so easily now...even with just one hand. Loved it so much, I bought more and have have given as gifts! Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easily move countertop appliances
reviews.reviewText: We move our coffee maker out from under the cabinets every morning to prevent our cabinets from warping due to the steam that comes out when making coffee. This mat makes it so much easier to just slide the coffee maker in and out without scratching the countertops.
